description: Unbound DNS server queries and statistics

targets.query: SELECT count("time_to_resolve") FROM "unbound_queries" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter) fill(null)
SELECT count("client") FROM "unbound_adblock" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter) fill(null)
SELECT count("response_size") FROM "unbound_queries" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/ AND ("return_code"::tag = 'REFUSED' OR "return_code"::tag = 'SERVFAIL')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"::tag

panels.description: Cache hit rate over the previous 5 minutes
panels.title: Cache hit %

panels.description: Cache prefetches per second over a 1 minute window

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "exec_value" WHERE ("type_instance"::tag = 'total.num.prefetch') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"::tag

panels.title: Cache Prefetches /sec

panels.description: DNS queries from clients per second over a 1 minute window
panels.title: Queries /sec

panels.description: Number of replies per second from upstream DNS servers over a 1 minute window
panels.title: Recursive Replies /sec

targets.query: SELECT count("response_size") FROM "unbound_queries" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT count("matched") FROM "unbound_adblock" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "unbound_queries" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "unbound_queries" WITH KEY = "host"

list.description: Dirty hack to display total value over the whole time period "GROUP BY time($forever)"
list.name: forever

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "unbound_queries" WITH KEY = "client"
list.name: client

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "unbound_queries" WITH KEY = "client"

title: Unbound
